bibl.title: A Preliminary Assessment of the Pottery Assemblage from the Port Town of Adulis (Eritrea). Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Paper presented at the Annual International Egyptological Colloquium 2011, entitled Mariners and Traders: Connections between the Red Sea Littoral, Arabia and Beyond, held at The British Museum on 2 August 2011. - Introduction. - Sector 1 and sector 4. - The pottery assemblage.

bibl.title: British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.seg: Zazzaro Chiara and Andrea Manzo, in collaboration with Ghirmay Teklemariam, Mehretab Tabo Sium, Thomas Tesfagiyorgis Paulos, A Preliminary Assessment of the Pottery Assemblage from the Port Town of Adulis (Eritrea). Avec résumé en anglais.

British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan 18 (2012) pp. 233-246, 12 figg. n./bl. et coul. [Uniquement accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://www.britishmuseum.org/research/publications/online_journals/bmsaes/issue_18/azzaro_and_manzo.aspx >.]

Paper presented at the Annual International Egyptological Colloquium 2011, entitled Mariners and Traders: Connections between the Red Sea Littoral, Arabia and Beyond, held at The British Museum on 2 August 2011. - Introduction. - Sector 1 and sector 4. - The pottery assemblage.
